name: breed_nfts
attributes: # [doc = " parent_1 と parent_2 から offspring を生成するが、"]
# [doc = " 同一アカウントチェックが抜けている Duplicate Mutable Account 脆弱性あり"]
body: let parent_1 = & mut ctx . accounts . parent_1 ;
let parent_2 = & mut ctx . accounts . parent_2 ;
let offspring = & mut ctx . accounts . offspring ;
let ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
let lvl = (parent_1 . level as u16) . saturating_mul (parent_2 . level as u16) ;
offspring . level = if lvl > 255 { 255 } else { lvl as u8 } ;
offspring . xp = parent_1 . xp . saturating_mul ((seed as u64) . saturating_add (1)) . saturating_div (3) ;
offspring . score = parent_1 . score . saturating_mul (parent_2 . score) . saturating_div (1000) ;
offspring . trait_id = (parent_1 . trait_id << (seed % 5)) ^ (parent_2 . trait_id >> ((seed as u32) % 3)) ;
offspring . name = format ! ("{}▶{}#{}" , parent_1 . name , parent_2 . name , seed) ;
offspring . mixed = ((parent_1 . mixed as u32) . saturating_mul (parent_2 . mixed as u32) . saturating_div (256)) as u16 ;
parent_1 . history . push (format ! ("Used in breeding at {}" , ts)) ;
parent_2 . history . push (format ! ("Used in breeding at {}" , ts)) ;
msg ! ("Bred NFT '{}' level={} xp={} score={}" , offspring . name , offspring . level , offspring . xp , offspring . score) ;

fields.name: offspring
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 生成される子 NFT"] # [account (init , payer = breeder , space = 8 + GameNft :: SIZE)]
